Text: This is supposed to be a very dark and disturbing movie,featuring great performances,I've been looking for it since last year.Thanks...

only right channel working.
sure you can work around it but makes the already poor audio quality even worse.

AUDIO is broken.

left channel is completely missing, only right channel is working.

A/V - Video would have been ok for a screened but feels a bit on the low end for a straight dvdrip. Watchable though.
Audio is only mono but apart from that its ok.

M - This should really have been a much better movie, but so much was poorly executed that its merely mediocre. Too bad, could/should have been great.
